parts.text: {"word":"present","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"現在の、今の、現時点の","english_definition":"existing or occurring now.","examples":[{"sentence":"The present situation is very complex.","translation":"現在の状況は非常に複雑です。"},{"sentence":"In the present day, technology is rapidly advancing.","translation":"現代では、技術は急速に進歩しています。"},{"sentence":"What are your present plans?","translation":"現在の予定は何ですか？"}],"collocations":["at present (現在)","the present time (現在)","the present situation (現在の状況)","the present government (現政権)","the present owner (現在の所有者)"],"synonyms":["current","existing","contemporary","immediate"],"antonyms":["past","future"]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"出席している、居合わせている","english_definition":"being in a particular place.","examples":[{"sentence":"Were you present at the meeting?","translation":"あなたは会議に出席していましたか？"},{"sentence":"Only a few students were present today.","translation":"今日はほんの数人の生徒しか出席していませんでした。"}],"collocations":["be present at (～に出席している)","all present and correct (全員出席)"],"synonyms":["attending","here","available"],"antonyms":["absent"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"贈り物、プレゼント","english_definition":"a thing given to someone as a gift.","examples":[{"sentence":"I received many presents for my birthday.","translation":"誕生日にはたくさんのプレゼントをもらいました。"},{"sentence":"She gave him a present to thank him.","translation":"彼女はお礼に彼にプレゼントをあげました。"}],"collocations":["birthday present (誕生日プレゼント)","Christmas present (クリスマスプレゼント)","wedding present (結婚祝い)","give a present (プレゼントをあげる)","receive a present (プレゼントをもらう)"],"synonyms":["gift","offering","donation"],"antonyms":[]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitivity":"vt","definition":"提示する、示す、発表する、贈る","english_definition":"to give or offer something to someone; to show or describe something.","examples":[{"sentence":"He presented his ideas to the committee.","translation":"彼は委員会に自分のアイデアを提示した。"},{"sentence":"The company will present its new product at the trade fair.","translation":"その会社は展示会で新製品を発表する予定です。"},{"sentence":"The mayor presented the award to the winner.","translation":"市長が受賞者に賞を贈呈しました。"}],"collocations":["present an idea (アイデアを提示する)","present a report (報告書を提出する)","present an award (賞を贈呈する)","present a show (ショーを上演する)","present evidence (証拠を提示する)"],"synonyms":["offer","give","show","introduce","display","exhibit"],"antonyms":["hide","conceal","withdraw"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"現在、現在形","english_definition":"the period of time now occurring.","examples":[{"sentence":"Forget the past and focus on the present.","translation":"過去のことは忘れて、現在に集中しなさい。"},{"sentence":"The present is all we have.","translation":"私たちには現在しかない。"},{"sentence":"In the present, many people use smartphones.","translation":"現在、多くの人々がスマートフォンを使っています。"}],"collocations":["the present moment (現在の瞬間)","live in the present (現在を生きる)"],"synonyms":["now","today","the present time"],"antonyms":["past","future"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「praesens」（目の前にいる、存在する）に由来。これは「praeesse」（～の前にいる、～を管理する）から派生し、「prae-」（前に）+「esse」（いる、存在する）という要素から構成される。","priority":"★★☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈpreznt/ (adjective, noun) , /prɪˈzent/ (verb)","syllables":"pre-sent"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"presents","verb_forms":{"present_simple":["present","presents"],"past_simple":"presented","past_participle":"presented","present_participle":"presenting"}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**present**」は、品詞によって発音が変わる単語です。形容詞と名詞（贈り物）の場合は /ˈpreznt/、動詞の場合は /prɪˈzent/ となります。意味も多岐にわたり、形容詞としては「現在の」「出席している」、名詞としては「贈り物」「現在」、動詞としては「提示する」「贈る」といった意味があります。文脈によって意味を判断する必要があります。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I am present to the meeting.","correct":"✓ I am present at the meeting.","note":"「～に出席している」は "present at" を使います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He presented me a gift.","correct":"✓ He presented a gift to me. / ✓ He presented me with a gift.","note":"「人に物を贈る」場合、"present something to someone" または "present someone with something" の形を使います。"},{"incorrect":"✗ The present is now.","correct":"✓ The present is the now.","note":"「現在」を指す名詞として使う場合、定冠詞 "the" をつけるのが一般的です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["presentation (名詞: プレゼンテーション、発表)","presenter (名詞: プレゼンター、司会者)","presence (名詞: 存在、出席)","presently (副詞: まもなく、すぐに、現在)"],"phrasal_verbs":["present with (～に～を贈る)"],"priority":"★★★"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1 (基本的な意味)、B2 (より高度な意味)","frequency_google_ngram":"高頻度 (High frequency)","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**present**」はいくつかの意味を持つ単語です。形容詞としては、「現在の」や「出席している」という意味があります。名詞としては、「プレゼント（贈り物）」や「現在」という意味があります。動詞としては、「提示する」や「贈る」という意味があります。文脈によって意味が異なるので、注意が必要です。発音も品詞によって変わるので、意識して使い分けましょう。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The **present** economic situation is uncertain.","translation":"現在の経済状況は不安定です。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"現在の"},{"sentence":"All students must be **present** for the exam.","translation":"すべての学生は試験に出席しなければなりません。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"出席している"},{"sentence":"She received a beautiful **present** on her birthday.","translation":"彼女は誕生日に美しいプレゼントをもらった。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"贈り物"},{"sentence":"We should learn from the past and focus on the **present**.","translation":"私たちは過去から学び、現在に集中すべきです。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"現在"},{"sentence":"The speaker will **present** his research findings tomorrow.","translation":"講演者は明日、彼の研究結果を発表する予定です。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"提示する"},{"sentence":"The company **presented** him with an award for his outstanding service.","translation":"会社は彼の優れた功績に対して彼に賞を贈った。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"贈る"}]}
